org.apache.jackrabbit.rmi.client.principal

Class ClientGroup

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.jackrabbit.rmi.client.principal.ClientPrincipal
      • org.apache.jackrabbit.rmi.client.principal.ClientGroup
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Group, Principal

    public class ClientGroup
extends ClientPrincipal
implements Group
    Local adapter for the JCR-RMI RemoteGroup interface. This class makes a remote group locally available using the Java Group interface.
    See Also:
    Group, RemoteGroup
